QuestData.Title: Walk With The Earth Mother
QuestData.Description: You have fought bravely alongside me, $n, and done much for my people. If every $r could be as noble, the future of the Horde might not disturb me so much.$B$BI would ask you to ease my worries further. Go to Orgrimmar. Tell High Overlord Saurfang how the Grimtotem were driven out. Let him know our pride and discipline, our strength and sorrow.$B$BTal at the Skytower will send you on your way. Go in peace, friend.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Mark of Bloodhoof to High Overlord Saurfang, located in Grommash Hold in Orgrimmar.$B$BYou may speak with Tal the Wind Rider Master to travel there, or wait for the zeppelin.
